Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $120 by many of our customers. Considering its quality and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exclusive opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special price of $110. This is a great chance to save while enjoying the full value of the product. Please let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
